resources.string: This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions. Open the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
For TextOne to function correctly, please grant permission to access your Recent Calls.
For TextOne to function correctly, please grant permission to access your Contacts.
To take photos, please grant TextOne permission to access your Camera.
To send photos, please grant TextOne permission to access your Gallery.
To make/answer phone calls, please grant TextOne permission to record audio.
